response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $15,000. After careful consideration, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product for $14,000. This price not only ensures a fair deal but also allows us to maintain a competitive edge in the market. I look forward to hearing your decision soon. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Thank you for considering our product.", "product_price": 14000}
